trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE1_00554_OPERATOR00510_000_000<tab>They say this is the last leg of our expedition into Eureka. It's been hard work under bloody miserable conditions, but I'm almost sad to hear it'll be coming to an end.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE1_00554_OPERATOR00510_000_010<tab>There was some talk about sealing away a primal by the name of “Eureka.” ...Wasn't that what we were calling the island? Well, I'll let the scholars play their word games─I've got work to do.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE1_00554_OPERATOR00510_000_020<tab>Seems you're finished exploring the island, but I still have a few tasks that need doing around the port and such. Not that I mind too much─I've grown fond of this damn rock, nasty beasts and all!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE1_00554_OPERATOR00510_000_030<tab>Talk around the campfire says one of the explorers got himself killed... We're pretty sheltered here in the base, so it's easy to forget how dangerous it can be out there.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE1_00554_OPERATOR00510_000_040<tab>You remember the explorer who died? Now they're saying he's come back to life! Bugger me, it's enough to make a man's head hurt... You know what? I think I'll just keep my mouth shut, and get back to putting the port in order.
